sentence.Network_en: Her decision to cancel the concert is bound to disappoint her fans.
sentence.Network_cn: 她决定取消这场音乐会，肯定会使她的歌迷失望。

sentence.Network_en: He's building me up too much — I may disappoint him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他将我捧上了天,我可能会令他失望.

sentence.Network_en: I'm sorry to disappoint your hope.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 词汇竞赛 - 中国习网 ... Vision 视觉，景象 Disappoint 使失望 Appoint 约定.
高中英语单词表 ... disagreement n 不一致；分歧 disappoint vt. 使失望; 使(计划等)受挫折 disaster n 灾难；灾祸.
职称英语C级词汇 ... disappear vi. 消失，不见，消亡，失踪 disappoint vt. 使失望，使(计划等)落空 disaster n. 灾难.
新概念英语第二册单词总汇_英语网 ... rush vi. 冲，涌去，袭击 disappoint vt. 使失望，使沮丧 sack n. 袋，包，睡袋.

list.abs: greatly是什么意思_百度知道 ... adv. 很，大大地；非常 greatly disappointed 大失所望；大失所看 Greatly Inspired 深受鼓舞.
...部分bug，只剩下一些小bug，他对社区的决定表示非常失望（very disappointed）。
bitter什么意思？_百度知道 ... bitter end 最后；结局 bitterly disappointed 透心凉；彻底的失望 bitter about 痛苦于.
新概念英语第二册学习笔记（2） ... chilly： 寒冷的 bitterly disappointed： 彻底的失望 a drop of： 一缕.
大学英语四级词汇短语总归纳-自考-搜狐博客 ... clumsy at 做…很笨拙 disappointed at 对…失望 excellent at 极其擅长于.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'deprive of an office or position'): from Old French desappointer

entry.def: If things or people disappoint you, they are not as good as you had hoped, or do not do what you hoped they would do.

example.ex: She knew that she would disappoint him.
example.tran: 她知道她会令他失望的。

example.ex: A spokesman for UNHCR said he was surprised and disappointed by the decision.
example.tran: 联合国难民署的一位发言人说他对这一决定既震惊又失望。

means.word_mean: 1. fail to meet the hopes or expectations of;

sentences.sentence: "Her boyfriend let her down when he did not propose marriage"

auth_sentence.content: The drama on the field did not disappoint either.
auth_sentence.res_content: The drama on the field did not disappoint either.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The drama on the field did not disappoint either.

auth_sentence.content: Luckily, Into Your Heart is unlikely to disappoint.
auth_sentence.res_content: Luckily, Into Your Heart is unlikely to disappoint.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Luckily, Into Your Heart is unlikely to disappoint.

auth_sentence.content: He seems destined in my opinion to disappoint everybody.
auth_sentence.res_content: He seems destined in my opinion to disappoint everybody.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He seems destined in my opinion to disappoint everybody.

stems_affixes.word_buile: appoint[v.指定,任命]+ment表名词→n.约会, 指定
point点,变尖,指,针→n.点, 尖端, 分数 v.弄尖,指向,指出 v.指
point点,变尖,指,针+er表名词→尖的东西→指针

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使失望; 使受挫折;对……失信
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis不+appoint任命→不被任命→使失望
point点,变尖,指,针→n.点, 尖端, 分数 v.弄尖,指向,指出 v.指

Sentence.sentence: We feel disappointed in ourselves and ashamed.
I heard the recent sculpture exhibit was kind of disappointing.

sentences.en: I promised to buy my son a new bicycle but I had to disappoint him.
sentences.cn: 我答应给儿子买辆新自行车, 可我不得不让他失望了。

jushi.chinese: 在某些地方,生活已经让人很失望。

jushi.english: I'm sorry to disappoint you,but I can't come after all.
jushi.chinese: 对不起,要使你的希望落空了,我不能来了。
